payload.name: 3TU.Datacentrum | TU Delft
payload.description: Repository for research data from beta sciences.
payload.enduserDescription: Repository for research data from beta sciences.
payload.institutionDescription: Repository for research data from beta sciences.
payload.manipulationNotes:
The attribute manipulation for this service does three things:
1.  Take the email address of the user and make it the nameid value ($subjectId).
1.  If the schacHomeOrganization is "surfguest.nl" add "_surfguest.nl@vu.nl" to the uid of the user
1.  If there are multiple email addresses, prefer those ending with @vu.nl. 

</br>
# Email address filtering
 The filtering has the following features:
1.   Prefer an address ending with @vu.nl, remove others from the list of email addresses.
1.   If no email address ends with @vu.nl take the primary address (at location [0]. This is why there is a loop going backwards and a conditional removal if there is > 1 address left).
1.   Make the preferred address the nameid value ($subjectId).
</br></br>More information about attributes can be found here: https://wiki.surfnet.nl/display/surfconextdev/Attributes+in+SURFconext

descriptions.en: Repository for research data from beta sciences.
descriptions.nl: Repository voor onderzoeksgegevens uit de Beta-wetenschappen.
